front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Secure Device Identity
front.abstract: A Secure Device Identifier (DevID) is cryptographically bound to a device and supports authentication of the deviceâ€™s identity. An Initial Device Identifier (IDevID) provide by the supplier of a device can be supplemented by Local Device Identifiers (LDevIDs) facilitating enrollment (provisioning of authentication and authorization credentials) by local network administrators.
